name: GetDiced
description:
Project uploaded for GMTK game jam 22

(This game is unwinable at current state :/ )

You are 2 vegetables searching to escape the dice factory... by getting diced.

You can play 1 and 2 players.

(Bugs may occur, we ran out of time :/)

Controls:

P1: Wasd, shift and space

P2: arrows and right ctrl
